name: 1 Trillion Credits In Debt
summary: 1 Trillion Credits In Debt is a turn based co-op game with one task: Pay off a debt of 1 trillion credits by yourself or with friends. Master weapons, test out multiple builds, strategies, modifiers, contracts, and help the duo achieve their freedom.

name: 1 Ton
summary: An indie game about causing destruction.

name: 1 Teratoaster
summary: Sell toasters in an alien populated universe

name: 1 Trait Escape
summary: An action rogue-lite set in the 1 Trait Danger universe. Fight your way through swarms of enemies and bosses with minigames sprinkled in-between. Grow stronger every time you fail until you are able to escape back to Earth.

name: 1 to 1 Humanoid Edible Toys
summary: A story about Ambiguous Affection, Appetite, and Tantalizing Desires.
